That is tuition free, fee free, and as many courses as they want. They are only responsible for the textbook. This includes private and public high schools, home school students, and students who have earned their HiSET / Adult Diploma in 2020.

SUMMER START is a statewide gift to the 2020 class – no matter what they are doing or where they are going post-graduation. NAMI (National Alliance on Mental Illness) Maine Launches Teen Text Support Line.

Lots of things are different right now for teens in Maine due to COVID-19, and that can feel overwhelming. It's important for Maine's teens to talk about their feelings and get support from another young person.

You are not alone!
Send the Teen Text Support Line a text at (207) 515-8398.

We're here for you every day from 12pm - 10pm. This peer support text line is for youth 14-20 years old and staffed by individuals between 19 - 23 years of age.

Factor Hopscotch - Draw a hopscotch board or build one with pieces of paper and tape and write single digit numbers in each box. Then, pick a 2 digit number and try to make it across only hopping on the factors that fit inside that 2 digit number!

For example, if this was my hopscotch board and I was thinking of the number 24, I could hop on 1, 2, 3, 4, 6 and 8.

But if my number was 30, I could only hop on 1, 2, 3, 5, 6, and 10. #RSU16Learns
